page.title: 02Industry (E. Kilbride North)
page.content: Being a New Town most industries are modern and are located in industrial estates. There are two of these in our area both to be found on the outskirts of the town and alongside main access roads for heavy lorries: College Mil- ton on the Queensway and Nerston close by the Expressway which links with the main M74 motorway to Glasgow or the South. Companies big and small share these estates making a variety of goods (eg Rolls-Royce ; aero engines : Radio Times ; printing : NCS ; Machine Tools : Scotbeef ; fresh and canned meat : Schweppes ; soft drinks). Most of the industries would be classified as light industry :- (engineering, electronics, food and drink, clothing, etc) with a large number of women being employed in the 192 different factories in the area.
